Name: Honi Honi
Ingredients: 5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Double old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of pineapple wedge, Luxardo Maraschino Cherry & mint sprigs bouquet.
FINE STRAIN into chilled glass filled with crushed ice.
Garnish with pineapple wedge, maraschino cherry and mint sprigs bouquet.
Review: A Mai Tai -based on whiskey rather than rum.
History: Adapted from a recipe in Victor Bergeron 's 1972 Trader Vic's Bartender's Guide . The name of this vintage Tiki drink means 'Kiss Kiss'.
Nutrition: One serving of Honi Honi contains 198 calories
